title: JeromeTash

content: I am seeking for a 300 USDT loan for a month with a 10% interest rate payable by 8th October 2023Loan Amount: 300 USDTLoan Purpose:  Urgent and PersonalLoan Repay Amount: 330 USDTLoan Repay Date:  8th - October 2023 or earlierType of Collateral:  N/ASignature from my staked addressStaked here:Code:-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----This is to prove that I am still in control of this Bitcointalk account (username: Jerometash) on this day 8th/09/2023 and that no one else is trying to acquire a loan through my account.-----BEGIN SIGNATURE-----bc1qkhse2xjm9wyaswgxrjny7l8td25z724d24qvghIGr+lBxOmj0oYGIQ5E4bR8QnkoUsNl7ieu9YpjId8t4dSMPm0tl41z9qv22yamJPo9Jv/c+ogxGLM9D3v6A1Bxo=-----END BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----Signed using Sparrow Wallet.USDT TRC20 is preferable due to lower fees, but I am also open to using Bitcoin. Any interested members can alert me in this thread or via PM.
